AttackerCapabilities: Ability to analyze network traffic and extract cookies
Ability to apply cryptographic hash functions

Steps.Description: Analyze the cookies set by the web application

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The cookies may contain valuable information needed to authenticate

Steps.Description: Apply SHA-1 algorithm to the nonce values

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The passcode values may be derived from the SHA-1 hash of the nonce values
StepDetails.Action: Apply SHA-1 algorithm to the nonce values
StepDetails.Result: Obtain the passcode values by taking the first 8 characters of the hashed nonce values

Steps.Description: Use the obtained passcode to perform a request

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The passcode may grant access to restricted pages or functionality
StepDetails.Action: Perform a POST request with the passcode
StepDetails.Result: Successfully access the staff login page

Steps.Description: Retrieve the flag from the staff login page

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The flag may be displayed on the staff login page
StepDetails.Action: Extract the flag from the HTML source code of the staff login page
